comments:
Hi,

I'm currently trying to follow the steps to "An introduction to using TPTP's automated GUI recorder".
http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/test/documents/userguides/Intro-Auto-GUI.html#1.1
1. I followed the steps to: 1.1 Downloading TPTP's Automated GUI Recorder
2. I opened eclipse
3. I followed the steps to: 2.0 Creating an Automated GUI Test Suite
At step 2.9, when I click finish, I get the following error:
IWAT4001E An error has happened during the saving attempt.

I also attempted to create other types of tests (Manual/JUnit) and I get the same error. It also doesn't seem to have anything to do with https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=72205 which gives the same error number.

Here is the log file:
java.io.IOException: The path '/TestContainer/test-resources/AutomatedGUISuite.testsuite' is unmapped

Reassign this to Auto GUI Recorder - Ali Mehregani.  This is not HTTP recorder problem.
This really belongs to the Test.UI.FrameworksEditors owner since it occurs with all test types - Jerome.

Hi,

I don't know what was the source of the problem, but I deleted/reinstalled every component and I can now create a new test.

Should we changed status to resolve bug? J-F
Thanks, but I think the proper status is 'WORKSFORME'.
ACTION: Please update the target to the release AND iteration that this defect was returned/fixed.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
